Unnamed: 1: ETHICS AND BUSINESS INTEGRITY

We are committed to the highest standards of integrity and accountability. Our values and Code of Business Conduct (Code) guide how we act, work and communicate. Supported by our Speak Up Policy (our global whistleblower policy), we encourage our people to speak up when our values and standards of conduct are not being followed.

Read more about our Speak Up Policy and our EthicsPoint reporting hotline at www.south32.net 
Read more about our corporate governance in our 2023 Corporate Governance Statement available at www.south32.net
